Module hu.unipannon.virt.plot
Package hu.unipannon.virt.plot.control

Class LogPlotController

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.unipannon.virt.plot.control.PlotSpaceController
      • hu.unipannon.virt.plot.control.LogPlotController
  • public class LogPlotController
extends PlotSpaceController
    PlotSpaceController implementation responsible of handling a Logarithmic Line Plot. Stores Line data items and displays them inside the given Plot Space. Operates the same way as a LinePlotController.
    Author:
    Tóth Bálint
    See Also:
    Line, LinePlotController

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class hu.unipannon.virt.plot.control.PlotSpaceController

      Constructor Description
      LogPlotController()
      Default constructs a PlotSpaceController and inits the line storage.

    • Method Detail

      • resetDataLineNumbers

        public static void resetDataLineNumbers()
        Resets the line numbering for the plot. The counter operated by this function indexes the default palette for the line colors.

      • addLine

        public void addLine​(Line l)
        Adds a line data item.
        Parameters:
        l - line to be displayed.

      • setLogBase

        public void setLogBase​(int logBaseX,
                       int logBaseY)
        Sets the logarithm bases for the X and Y axis. If either value is 0, the axis will be linear.
        Parameters:
        logBaseX - logarightm base of the X axis.
        logBaseY - logarightm base of the Y axis.

      • setXTick

        public void setXTick​(double[] tick)
        Sets tick points for the X axis.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        tick - tick point values in absolute space.
